actors

Class Plant

  • java.lang.Object
    • actors.Plant

  • public class Plant
extends java.lang.Object
    A plant that attacks any insect that is nearby. As it levels up, damage and range increase
    Author:
    Dhruv Masurekar co-author William Hyun

      • hasNeighbor

        public boolean hasNeighbor(java.util.ArrayList<Insect> insects)
        Checks if there is at least one insect in the plant's range
        Parameters:
        insects - The insects that are in the grid
        Returns:
